reviews.text: We stayed here Friday night, we called a few hours in advance and booked a room. It seems they don't have that many rooms with en-suite, at least non were available this Friday night in low season.
reviews.title: Location is great, clean, good breakfast

likes.disliked: — The shared bathroom, however it was my choice.

reviews.text: I normally don't like shared bathroom, but the location and the fact that it was low season convinced me. The price per night was also convincing, in the otherwise expensive Schwitzerland.
reviews.title: Hotel Dom - Very good value
